turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Origin of Love.
turn.1: What is the origin of Love?
turn.2: Origin of Love "Origin of Love" is a song by the British singer and songwriter Mika.
turn.4: It was released as the second single in the United Kingdom from his third studio album, "The Origin of Love" (2012).
turn.6: It was written by Mika, Nick Littlemore and Paul Steel and produced by Nick Littlemore, Greg Wells and Mika.
turn.8: The single was released on British radio on 3 December 2012 and its music video was posted on 15 September 2012 on YouTube and Vimeo.
turn.9: Is there anything else interesting about this song?
turn.10: The music video, sometimes referred to as "The Origin of Love" short film, was recorded in the streets of Santiago, Chile, starred by Chilean actors Daniela Ramírez and Jorge Arecheta, directed by Mika and the Chilean director Cristián Jiménez, who provide a visual accompaniment to the title track.
turn.12: The music video for the original version of the track was originally premiered on 15 September 2012.
